definition: relating to the region of shallow water adjoining the seacoast
details:
adjective
- relating to the region of shallow water adjoining the seacoast
= example: relating to the region of shallow water adjoining the seacoast
- of or relating to the region of the sea over the continental shelf which is less than 200 meters deep
= example: of or relating to the region of the sea over the continental shelf which is less than 200 meters deep
